name: Cerebra LPO
description:
Cerebra LPO India Ltd., is a  Legal Process Outsourcing service provider company, offering total LPO solutions mainly to USA and Europe. Areas of services include Bankruptcy and Foreclosure, Corporate Law, Commercial Litigation, Family Law, Immigration, Intellectual Property Law, Medical Malpractice & Personal Injury and Property Law & Conveyancing. 
Services include Drafting Litigation Support documents, Legal Research, E-discovery and Documents Review, Case and Deposition Summarization, Legal Transcription, Coding, Billing, Accounting and other paralegal services.
Cerebra LPO India Ltd., is a subsidiary company of Cerebra Integrated Technologies Ltd an ISO 9001:2008 certified public limited company listed in Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). 
Cerebra started its operation in 1992 with the Hardware sector serving across the globe, later expanded to provide software services, IT Training, consulting, LPO (Legal Process Outsourcing) and BPO services. Cerebra has formed Joint Ventures (JVs) in the USA and UK for LPO services.
